Sentencas: Biomass, a source of renewable energy, represents an effective substitute to fossil fuels.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: Gasification is a process that organics are thermochemically converted into valuable gaseous products (e.g. biogas).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: In this work, the catalytic test demonstrated that the biogas produced from biomass gasification mainly consists of H-2, CH4, CO, and CO2, which were then be used as the fuel for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: Planar SOFCs were fabricated and adopted.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: The steam reforming of biogas was carried out at the anode of a SOFC to obtain a hydrogen-rich fuel.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: The performance of the SOFCs operating on generated biogas was investigated by I-V polarization and electrochemical impedance spectra characterizations.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: An excellent cell performance was obtained, for example, the peak power density of the SOFC reached 1391 mW.cm(-2) at 750 degrees C when the generated biogas was used as the fuel.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the SOFC fuelled by simulated biogas delivered a very stable operation.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells in combination with biomass gasification for electric power generation
